com.kukri.moviecatalog.service

Class DirectorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kukri.moviecatalog.service.DirectorService

  • public class DirectorService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service layer for handling business logic related to Director entities. Acts as an intermediary between the controller and repository.
